get

protected boolean get(FileChannel fileChannelOut)
Write the FileInterface to the fileChannelOut, thus bypassing the limitation of the file size to 2^32 bytes. This call closes the fileChannelOut with fileChannelOut.close() if the operation is in success.

Parameters:
fileChannelOut -
Returns:
True if OK, False in error.

getFileChannel

protected FileChannel getFileChannel()
Returns the FileChannel in In mode associated with the current file.

Returns:
the FileChannel (IN mode)

getRandomFile

protected RandomAccessFile getRandomFile()
Returns the RandomAccessFile in Out mode associated with the current file.

Returns:
the RandomAccessFile (OUT="rw")

getFileOutputStream

protected FileOutputStream getFileOutputStream(boolean append)
Returns the FileOutputStream in Out mode associated with the current file.

Parameters:
append - True if the FileOutputStream should be in append mode
Returns:
the FileOutputStream (OUT)
